summary: “Jump up Superstar!  You’re gonna go really far!  I’ll always be your 1-UP girl!”  What would you do if you got the cap from...
question: “Jump up Superstar!  You’re gonna go really far!  I’ll always be your 1-UP girl!”  What would you do if you got the cap from Super Mario Odessy?
answer:
Saur can respond you!

I would like be other pokemon but…

I would like Cappy to do my homework for me.

blog.name: artsy2bits
blog.title: ☆Just Me, The Galaxy, And My Imagination☆

summary: ☆I drew one of the new starter Pokémon’s, Grookey! I thought it would be cute to draw Grookey holding some sort of key! Sense...
body: ☆I drew one of the new starter Pokémon’s, Grookey! I thought it would be cute to draw Grookey holding some sort of key! Sense the Pokémon’s name has “Groo” and then “Key”! If Grookey’s final evaluation is good, I think I might pick him! Though- the other starters are really cute as well!! Perhaps I’ll be drawing them some time soon! Either way, I’m super excited to see what sort of new adventure we’ll be having in the Galar Region! ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ☆

Either way, I’m super excited to see what sort of new adventure we’ll be having in the Galar Region! ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ☆

summary: Wargroove Is Being Updated To Version 1.2.0 Tomorrow
title: Wargroove Is Being Updated To Version 1.2.0 Tomorrow
body:
Wargroove Is Being Updated To Version 1.2.0 Tomorrow

The official Wargroove blog has announced that the game will be updated tomorrow, March 6th. This update will bring the game to version 1.2.0. The patch notes have been released, and they’re quite long. The update does a lot of polishing and bug fixing, but there are some additions as well. If you want to see the patch notes for yourself, they are included down below.

Checkpoint system:

  • While…

summary: Sakurai habla de los riesgos de salud que pasó mientras trabajaba en Smash Bros. Ultimate
title: Sakurai habla de los riesgos de salud que pasó mientras trabajaba en Smash Bros. Ultimate
body:
Sakurai habla de los riesgos de salud que pasó mientras trabajaba en Smash Bros. Ultimate

El director de Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, Masahiro Sakurai, ha revelado el impacto físico de crear el último juego de lucha de Nintendo.

Sakurai, sinónimo de la cantidad ridícula de trabajo que puede llevar crear videojuegos, reveló en una entrevista con Nintendo Dream Web las prácticas de trabajo poco saludables que emprendió para crear Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. En algunos puntos,literalmente…

View On WordPress

title: [Feature] Fortnite Survey Statistics 2019
body:
[Feature] Fortnite Survey Statistics 2019

There is no denying that Fortnite has truly gripped the Gaming community. While I don’t play it myself, many of my friends do and so do their children. As a game that is generally free to play with its fair share of micro-transactions, it does make you wonder just how much people spend on Fortnite in order to get the best gear or weapons.

The good folks over at 10roarrecently ran a survey to find…

View On WordPress

tags: Turok será remasterizado para Nintendo Switch
summary: Turok será remasterizado para Nintendo Switch
title: Turok será remasterizado para Nintendo Switch
body:
Turok está siendo remasterizado para la consola híbrida de Nintendo, como un gracias a Nightdive Studios. De acuerdo con el listado de la web de Nintendo of America, el juego se estrena el 18 de marzo por $19,99 dólares Características de la remasterización: Mundo virtual en 3D: Corre, salta, escala en cualquier dirección en un mundo […]

La entrada Turok será remasterizado para Nintendo Switch aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..


Turok será remasterizado para Nintendo Switch
